isEndOfTurn() - Method in class swordandshield.models.Player
If there are no moves left in the turn it must be the end of the turn
isFacePosition(int, int) - Method in class swordandshield.models.Round
Returns a boolean if the given position is on one of the face positions.
isFirstTurn() - Method in class swordandshield.models.Player
If there's nothing on the board then it must be our very first turn
isOutOfBoundsOnBoard(int, int) - Method in class swordandshield.models.Round
Returns whether the given x,y position on the grid is out of bounds.

isPieceAtPos(int, int) - Method in class swordandshield.models.Round
Checks if the coordinates are outside of the 10 x 10 grid or in the corners and if there if not, returns if there is a piece at the location
isPieceAtPos(Coord) - Method in class swordandshield.models.Round
 
isSpawnPosition(int, int) - Method in class swordandshield.models.Round
Returns true if the x/y position passed is one of the two players spawn positions
isStartOfTurn() - Method in class swordandshield.models.Player
If some piece is moved/rotated or a piece is created, it physically cannot be the start on the turn.
